title: Nik Games

content:
Rusty Invades  Source Code
 A ‘Space Invader’ clone made with rust and made for the terminal.
Inspired by invaders
Dependencies on Linux Audio should work out-of-the-box on macOS, Windows, and iOS. For Linux, the downstream package for actually playing sound requires the Alsa development libraries to be installed.
CentOS sudo yum install -y alsa-lib-devel Debian/Ubuntu sudo apt install libasound2-dev pkg-config License Apache License (Version 2.0).
TODO ⬜ UI.
⬜ Score.
⬜ Lives.
⬜ Multiple levels.
⬜ Power ups.
⬜ Better sound.
Run Linux  Download binary. Extract. Open directory in terminal. Run ./rusty-invades
summary:
Rusty Invades  Source Code
 A ‘Space Invader’ clone made with rust and made for the terminal.
Inspired by invaders
Dependencies on Linux Audio should work out-of-the-box on macOS, Windows, and iOS. For Linux, the downstream package for actually playing sound requires the Alsa development libraries to be installed.
CentOS sudo yum install -y alsa-lib-devel Debian/Ubuntu sudo apt install libasound2-dev pkg-config License Apache License (Version 2.0).
TODO ⬜ UI.
title: Rusty Invades
